commentaries.bbcode: S Watson to Y Pathan, no run, %SPEED% full toss outside off stump. He doesn't offer a shot
commentaries.autoText: S Watson to Y Pathan, no run, %SPEED% full toss outside off stump. He doesn't offer a shot

commentaries.bbcode: S Watson to Y Pathan, [b]WICKET!!! Y Pathan is out[/b] c Dhawal Kulkarni b Shane Watson
commentaries.autoText: S Watson to Y Pathan, WICKET!!! Y Pathan is out c Dhawal Kulkarni b Shane Watson

commentaries.bbcode: [b]Wicket![/b] That could be the biggest moment in RR's season! Yusuf tries to go big, but picks out Kulkarni out at long off. Huge wicket!

message.text: Wicket! That could be the biggest moment in RR's season! Yusuf tries to go big, but picks out Kulkarni out at long off. Huge wicket!

commentaries.bbcode: The Strategic Timeout has been taken. That wicket has probably put the game back in RR's favour, but with Chawla and Shakib, you just never know. Morris' over will probably be the key What an exciting contest we have in prospect!

message.text: The Strategic Timeout has been taken. That wicket has probably put the game back in RR's favour, but with Chawla and Shakib, you just never know. Morris' over will probably be the key What an exciting contest we have in prospect!

commentaries.bbcode: Four! That'll brighten Mahmood's night! Lovely powerful shot through mid-wicket, and it's run away for four

message.text: Four! That'll brighten Mahmood's night! Lovely powerful shot through mid-wicket, and it's run away for four

commentaries.bbcode: Faulkner's back. Will we see the good or the bad death overs version of Faulkner? 49 required off 24.

message.text: Faulkner's back. Will we see the good or the bad death overs version of Faulkner? 49 required off 24.

commentaries.bbcode: [b]Wicket![/b] Great catch under pressure! Mahmood looks to go big down the ground, but it goes high rather than long, and Rahane takes a great catch at long on

message.text: Wicket! Great catch under pressure! Mahmood looks to go big down the ground, but it goes high rather than long, and Rahane takes a great catch at long on

commentaries.bbcode: [b]Six! [/b]And now a six! This game's not over! Swatted over long on, and it's gone all the way

message.text: Six! And now a six! This game's not over! Swatted over long on, and it's gone all the way

commentaries.bbcode: Four! Umesh is on fire! Four through cover, and it's 20 required off 7

commentaries.autoText: J Faulkner to U Yadav, %SPEED% full length outside off stump. He hits a nice boundary

commentaries.bbcode: Four! What sweet timing from Umesh! Another one goes through cover, and the game is back on!

message.text: Four! What sweet timing from Umesh! Another one goes through cover, and the game is back on!

commentaries.bbcode: So 16 required off 6. This could go either way!

message.text: So 16 required off 6. This could go either way!

commentaries.bbcode: C Morris to S Al Hasan, [b]WICKET!!! S Al Hasan is out[/b] c Steve Smith b Chris Morris
commentaries.autoText: C Morris to S Al Hasan, WICKET!!! S Al Hasan is out c Steve Smith b Chris Morris

commentaries.bbcode: [b]Wicket![/b] Chris Morris has had a night to remember! Shakib looks to go big, doesn't get all of it, and Smith takes the catch running round at long on. Umesh is back on strike though

message.text: Wicket! Chris Morris has had a night to remember! Shakib looks to go big, doesn't get all of it, and Smith takes the catch running round at long on. Umesh is back on strike though
